patthana7.21:4.1: Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.21:4.2: Naajjhattārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. #2
patthana7.21:5.1: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nabahiddhārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.21:5.2: Nabahiddhārammaṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naajjhattārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
